CIRCULAR NO.  23 / 2001 
 
Sub: FRISKING / CHECKING BY SECURITY PERSONNEL 
 
 
AVSEC Order No. 6/2001 was issued regarding frisking / checking by security 
personnel at the entry gate of the airport.  This order was issued for better security of 
terminal building.  On implementing the order, it was found that there were long queues 
outside the terminal building creating difficulty both for the passengers and visitors.  
Adequate facility was also not available for providing shelter to the queued up people 
outside the terminal building.  CISF looking after security of 27 airports, other airlines 
and also AAI have expressed their difficulty in implementing this order.  Taking into 
consideration the difficulty faced by both passengers and visitors it has been decided to 
withdraw this order with immediate effect. 
 
 
However the security personnel on reasonable suspicion may detain persons for 
frisking and checking at the entrance itself. 
 
 
 (R.K. Singh) 
Additional Commissioner of Security (CA) 
For Commissioner of Security (CA)
